deploy.abapAppDescLength: The deployment description cannot exceed 60 characters.
deploy.abapTransportNumRequired: Provide a transport request for your application.
deploy.abapInvalidNamespace: The namespace is invalid because there are too many forward slashes.
deploy.abapInvalidNamespaceLength: The namespace is limited to 10 characters. Entered {{length}}.
deploy.abapInvalidAppNameLength: The application name is limited to 15 characters. Entered {{length}}.
deploy.abapInvalidAppName: The application name must be prefixed with [{{prefix}}].
deploy.charactersForbiddenInAppName: Only alphanumeric, underscore, and slash characters are allowed.
deploy.invalidAppNameMultipleReason: The application name is invalid for multiple reasons:

ui5.namespaceMustStartWithLetter: The namespace must start with a letter.
ui5.namespaceEndInPeriod: The namespace cannot end with a period.
ui5.namespaceNumberAfterPeriod: A number cannot follow a period in the namespace.
ui5.lowerAlphaNumericDotsOnly: Only use lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots for the namespace.
ui5.namespaceSpecialCharacter: The namespace can only contain letters, digits, dots, and underscores.
ui5.moduleNameMustStartWithLetter: The module name must start with a letter.
ui5.nameCombinedTooLong: The combined length of the namespace and module name must not exceed {{length}} characters.
ui5.folderDoesNotExist: This folder does not exist. Please enter the root folder for your project.
ui5.folderDoesNotHaveCorrectPermissions: The selected folder does not have the required permissions. Please ensure you have permission to write to the selected folder and try again.
ui5.nameNull: The module name cannot be null.
ui5.nameUndefined: The module name cannot be undefined.
ui5.nameNotString: The module name must be a string.
ui5.nameLengthZero: The module name's length must be greater than zero.
ui5.nameStartsWithPeriod: The module name cannot start with a period.
ui5.nameStartsWithUnderscore: The module name cannot start with an underscore.
ui5.nameStartsOrEndsWithSpace: The module name cannot contain leading or trailing spaces.
ui5.nameBlocklisted: {{modName}} is a blocklisted module name. Choose a different name.
ui5.nameIsCoreModule: {{modName}} is a core module name. Choose a different name.
ui5.nameTooLong: The module name cannot exceed {{length}} characters.
ui5.nameTooShort: The module name must be at least {{length}} characters.
ui5.nameContainsSpecialCharacters: The module name cannot contain special characters: ("~'!()*)
ui5.nameNotUrlFriendly: The module name can only contain URL-friendly characters.
ui5.moduleAlreadyExists: The module folder named: {{folderName}} already exists at the specified path.
ui5.appFolderExistsAtPath: A module with this name already exists in the folder: {{-path}}.
ui5.folderContainsFioriApp: The project folder path already contains an SAP Fiori application in the folder: {{-path}}. Please choose a different folder and try again.
ui5.folderContainsCapApp: The selected project folder is part of an existing CAP project. This application must use the local CAP project as the data source.

general.invalidClient: [{{client}}] is invalid. Leave this field empty or enter a value between 000-999.
general.invalidValueForSpecialChars: The input must only contain Latin alphanumeric characters or the following symbols: '-','_','$' and '.'.
general.supportedFormats: Only alphanumeric and '{{allowedCharacters}}' characters are allowed.
general.nameContainsSpecialCharacters: Module name cannot contain special characters ("~'!()*)
general.nameNotUrlFriendly: Module name can only contain URL-friendly characters
general.moduleAlreadyExists: The module folder named: {{folderName}} already exists at the specified path
general.appFolderExistsAtPath: A module with this name already exists in the folder: {{-path}}
general.folderContainsCapApp: The selected project folder is part of an existing CAP project. This application must therefore use the local CAP project as the data source.
general.folderContainsFioriApp: The project folder path already contains an SAP Fiori application in the folder: {{-path}}. Please choose a different folder and try again.
general.windowsFolderPathTooLong: The combined length {{length}} of the target folder and module name exceeds the default Windows path length. This can cause issues with project generation.

adp.projectNameUppercaseError: The project name cannot contain uppercase letters.
adp.projectNameLengthErrorExt: The project name cannot exceed 61 characters or end with the word 'component'.
adp.projectNameValidationErrorExt: The project name must only contain alphanumeric characters. Every part must start with a letter and different parts can be separated by a period.
adp.projectNameLengthErrorInt: The project name cannot start with the word 'customer', exceed 61 characters, or end with the word 'component'.
adp.projectNameValidationErrorInt: The project name must only contain Latin alphanumeric characters and it must have at least two parts. The different parts must be separated by a period and every part must start with a letter.
adp.duplicatedProjectName: A project with this name already exists in your workspace. Please choose another name.
adp.differentNamespaceThanProjectName: The namespace must be the same as the project name.
adp.namespaceSameAsProjectNameError: The namespace must be the same as the project name.
adp.namespaceLengthError: The namespace cannot exceed 61 characters or end with the word 'component'.
adp.namespaceValidationError: The namespace must only contain alphanumeric characters. Every part must start with a letter and different parts can be separated by a period.
adp.achMandatoryError: The Application Component Hierarchy must only contain capital letters, digits, and dashes.
